Chap. 5 - The Message to Sell

                Burrough Valley, Cal., July 7, 1888. Dear Brethren and Sisters at --: 
     Let not the enemy of God and man control your thoughts, your words and actions. The message from the lips of Christ is, "Sell that ye have, and give alms; provide yourselves bags which wax not old, a treasure in the heavens that faileth not." There will be many great failures in earthly banks, and in speculations, including mining and real estate.
